column4: Hi, everyone. I'm wondering if anyone's familiar with USB microphones?
usb microphones on linux ... for me is a nightmare
have you gotten one to work, or is it an ongoing sort of thing for you too?
i got really frustrated and ripped it out... sorry, thats just my experience :)
lol, i've got another mic..just didn't wanna have to mess around with it :)
i just installed it today, i replaced fedora 3 on my notebook with ubuntu
everything has worked without extensive configuration
that's what i'm working at right now
what distros did you migrate from?
